Please use the following template for submitting your issues.

## Versions
### OMUN App Version, and dev tools version if building from source.

eg: "I encountered the issue on version..."

## Platform 
### Phone OS + Hardware or Browser/Development Tool. Be specific.

eg: "I encountered the issue using the ... on my ..."

## Issue
### Please be descriptive; screenshots are welcome.

eg: "... is not working properly..."

## Replicate Issue
### Walk me through how to replicate the issue myself. Include any platform-specific quirks. 

eg: "The issue occurs when..."


## Additional Information
### Optional. Include anything that doesn't fit in the above categories.

eg: "I think this might be the problem..." or "This other person also had this problem as well..."
